alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 8:52AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of western Benton, northwestern Washington, Delaware, northern Adair and northeastern Cherokee Counties through 930 AM CST... At 851 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong showers along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Leach to 3 miles northwest of Proctor to 6 miles west of Maryetta. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Jay... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Watts... Oaks... Springtown... Christie... Cincinnati... Leach... Scraper... Twin Oaks... Baron... Maysville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
